titles.title: PREP Act of 2018
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for teacher and school leader quality enhancement and to enhance institutional aid.
PREP Act of 2018
Preparing and Retaining Education Professionals Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Preparing and Retaining Education Professionals Act of 2018 or the PREP Act of 2018
This bill addresses the shortages of teachers and school leaders in elementary and secondary schools, including to provide professional development activities for teachers and leaders in high-need schools.
